__e: Well it'll be nice to get home to Baker Street, hey Holmes?
Come along, old chap. I suggest that you return to Baker Street, pack a bag and have a car ready to take us to the plane.
- You should be at Baker Street.
Well, you may eat with us then, Mr. Baker, and wash.
Now, old sport, about Miss Baker and that request we spoke of.
Could you tell me if there is a Samantha Baker there and if so, may I converse with her briefly?
When did you last see a midwife? Don't know.
Yes, Baker is one of the boys.
